content: gretchen the goldfish an original crochet pattern by kendra skeene www youarenotyourjob com/kendra materials abbreviations lions brand felting yarn in pumpkin chain = chain medium weight single_crochet = single_crochet 3 75mm crochet hook half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet needle for sewing pieces together double_crochet = double_crochet stuffing tc = treble_crochet fo = finish off increase = increase two single_crochet in one stitch decrease = decrease one single_crochet across two stitches st = stitch x2 = repeat two times etc for multiple numbers note a magic_ring is a method for crocheting in the round to keep control of the size of the circle i found this tutorial to be really helpful http //www crochetme com/dec_jan_0405/ reads_round html body this part is worked in the round as a spiral when the shape starts to get smaller stuff with fiberfill chain 4 single_crochet decrease single_crochet 3 times in the same loop going around to back side of chain decrease increase increase single_crochet increase x2 single_crochet x2 increase x2 single_crochet x4 increase x2 single_crochet x4 increase 2x single_crochet x6 increase x2 single_crochet x 16 increase x2 single_crochet x4 increase single_crochet x3 increase x2 single_crochet x3 increase single_crochet x4 single_crochet x6 increase single_crochet x12 increase single_crochet x5 decrease x2 single_crochet x2 decrease single_crochet x6 decrease x2 single_crochet x10 decrease x2 single_crochet x10 decrease x2 single_crochet x19 decrease x2 single_crochet x8 decrease then decrease another starting with the last st from the previous decrease two decreases over 3 stitches instead of 2 decreases over 4 stitches single_crochet x8 single_crochet x6 increase single_crochet x4 increase single_crochet x3 decrease single_crochet x4 decrease single_crochet increase single_crochet x4 increase single_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease single_crochet x2 decrease single_crochet decrease single_crochet x6 decrease single_crochet decrease x2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet x2 decrease single_crochet x2 decrease single_crochet decrease x4 fo face tail make 2 start with a magic_ring see abbreviations start with a magic_ring half_double_crochet x3 pull ring for more info closed tight ch2 turn 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next st 10 half_double_crochet in ring join do not pull ring chain 3 turn tc x2 2tc in next st tc x2 completely closed but do pull stitches chain 3 turn 3 tc in next st double_crochet x2 half_double_crochet x2 single_crochet x2 together chain 1 turn single_crochet x3 half_double_crochet x3 double_crochet x2 3tc in last st ch1 single_crochet x3 increase scx3 increase single_crochet x3 join fo ch1 single_crochet x2 double_crochet 3 times in next st double_crochet 2 times in next st half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 3 times in next chain half_double_crochet sew onto back end of the body double_crochet x2 double_crochet 3 times in next st single_crochet x2 join hide ends of yarn ch1 single_crochet x4 skip 1 st single_crochet x2 half_double_crochet x5 single_crochet x2 skip bottom fins make 2 1 st single_crochet x3 fo start with a magic_ring half_double_crochet x2 pull ring sew face carefully onto front end of the closed tight body see diagram hide ends of yarn chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in next st chain 2
